title: Stay with Me
description: Now A #1 Bestselling Series  For Rae, things feel more like a black hole than bright sunshine. With her two best friends losing themselves in one another, she feels more alone than ever. Clint's left. Her mother's gone off the deep end. D.J. is louder and more abusive than ever. She doesn't know what to do. She has nowhere to turn. So, she does the only thing she can. The only thing she knows to do. Because she isn't done with Clinton Clarke yet.  And she has a strong feeling he's not really done with her, either.
author: Rebel Hart
